name: Locker 49
description:
'Locker 49' is the first part of a series of weird fiction/alt-horror Twine games being written by The Weird Fiction Ally.

This segment of the story is about everything getting weird really quickly. It'll probably take under ten minutes to get through.

You can follow the development of my games as well as other cool things at weirdfictionally.tumblr.com and @weirdfically on Twitter!
